function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"City confronted with earlier epidemics","Impact":"Risk of repeating past mistakes and ineffective strategies in managing epidemics","Mitigation":"Studying historical strategies and their effectiveness to inform present decision-making","Technologies":"Historical research, data analysis, and expert consultation","People":"City officials, public health professionals, urban planners","Owner":"City officials, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Cholera and yellow fever epidemics in Buenos Aires between 1867 and 1871","Impact":"Limitation of traditional local, municipal governance arrangements exposed","Mitigation":"Implementing centralized control over urban planning and development","Technologies":"Data analysis, monitoring systems, centralized governance tools","People":"City officials, urban planners, public health agencies","Owner":"City officials, municipal government"}]}
